title: Indiscretion
description: One night changed everything…Cole Hunter was arrogant.Sexy.And had eyes that made me melt with just one glance.I built walls around my heart to block out men like him.But he knocked them down. Obliterated them.Made me feel things I’d never felt before. He was the savior I didn’t want.My drug.And I was his addict.When I was with him, nothing else mattered.Not even a relapse.
author: Callie Anderson
